programme.title: Baby Boy
programme.desc: A 20-year-old unemployed father of two living at home is challenged to grow up by his mother and her new boyfriend

programme.title: Making of 'The Danish Girl'
programme.desc: A look at "The Danish Girl," a 2015 adaptation of David Ebershoff's novel about early 20th-century Danish painter Einar Wegener, who was one of the first people to have sex-reassignment surgery. The film stars Eddie Redmayne, Alicia Vikander and Matthias Schoenaerts, and is directed by Tom Hooper

programme.title: Like Mike
programme.desc: Pint-size rap music star Lil Bow Wow shows that he can play ball as well as he raps in this youth-oriented comedy about a young boy whose dream comes true in an unexpected way. Calvin Cambridge (Lil Bow Wow) is a 14-year-old boy, who, since the death of his parents, has been living in an orphanage run by the unpleasantly eccentric Stan Bittleman (Crispin Glover). While the tough but caring Sister Theresa (Anne Meara) tries to encourage the kids, Calvin knows that he and most of the other kids his age are poor prospects for adoption. Calvin loves basketball and idolizes Michael Jordan, but he's too short to be much of a challenge to the older kids when shooting hoop at the playground. One day, Calvin discovers a pair of old basketball sneakers with the initials "MJ" written on the inside. Calvin is convinced they once belonged to Michael Jordan, but he can hardly believe what happens when he puts them on -- suddenly he's able to make superhuman jump shots and dunks just like a miniature version of Air Jordan himself. Calvin's newly developed talent on the court comes to the attention of Frank Bernard (Eugene Levy), the manager of the Los Angeles Knights, an NBA team having a humiliating season. Bernard brings Calvin to the team as a novelty item, but with the help of Coach Wagner (Robert Forster) and the new kid's can-do attitude, the Knights start to climb out of the cellar and look like possible season champs. However, Tracey Reynolds (Morris Chestnut), who used to be the team's star player, isn't happy to have his thunder stolen by a 14-year-old boy -- especially when he's made Calvin's roommate and de-facto guardian on the road. Like Mike also features cameo appearances by a number of pro basketball stars, including Allen Iverson, Chris Webber, and Jason Kidd

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: When their old pal Reuben has a heart attack after being double-crossed by scheming businessman Willie Bank, Danny Ocean's team of gifted grifters reunite to get their own back. Thriller

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: When their old pal Reuben has a heart attack after being double-crossed by scheming businessman Willie Bank, Danny Ocean's team of gifted grifters reunite to get their own back. Thriller

programme.desc: Gruesome horror about a group of American twentysomethings whose Mexican holiday takes a grisly turn. Unfortunately, the mercy mission turns into a desperate fight for survival as the tourists discover that something deeply unpleasant is waiting for them in the ruins. Adapted from the novel by Scott B Smith

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas and the other Gladers journey across a brutal, obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the mysterious organisation known as WCKD

programme.desc: Romantic comedy about a TV reporter sets out to change her ways after a homeless psychic tells her that she has only a week to live(n)

In a world where parties go on for days and they frequently can't tell whether it's night or day, Danny questions whether these people are his real friends. But is Danny everything he seems? Starring Val Kilmer, Vincent D'Onofrio, Peter Sarsgaard, Adam Goldberg, Doug Hutchison, Anthony LaPaglia(n)

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: A Cuban refugee becomes a drug lord in Miami. Inspired by actual events(n)

Pressured into committing a murder for the gang, he is caught and sent down again but this time, there is a chance of redemption and possible salvation when he once again regains his freedom

programme.title: Prelude to a Kiss

Trying to win himself back into favour, he latches on to tailor Geoffrey Rush, whose wife works for the government. Rush, reluctantly blackmailed into providing intelligence, offers Brosnan increasingly lurid stories which, embellished again and sent to London, create a political incident that begins to spiral out of control

programme.title: The Astronaut Farmer

programme.title: Vacation

programme.title: True Story
programme.desc: In this psychological thriller based on actual events, a disgraced journalist plays a game of cat and mouse with an accused murderer who assumed his identity while on the run

programme.title: Bicentennial Man
programme.desc: The Martin family is turned upside down when Richard Martin brings home a new robot. An uplifting, funny tale following the life and times of a household appliance. As Andrew begins to experience emotions and creative thought, the Martins soon discover that they don't have an ordinary robot

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: Drama looking at how whistleblower Dr Jeffrey Wigand and a producer on the American current affairs show 60 Minutes took on the US tobacco industry in a bid to expose the addictive nature of nicotine. Focusing on the human interest story of a family man under terrifying pressures, the factually based action also vividly brings home the David and Goliath story of a battle that made US legal history

programme.title: Everest
programme.desc: In this nail-biting adventure docudrama set in 1996, several groups of climbers successfully scale Mount Everest, only to be faced with tragedy when a monster snowstorm surprises them as they attempt to make their descent

programme.desc: A special episode offering a comprehensive portrait of the International Olympic Committee, its impact on international competition and its power and influence. Also: a look at the IOC's role in the turmoil surrounding the games in Rio

Brian De Palma directed this stylish version of James Ellroy's novel. Hilary Swank, Mia Kirshner, Mike Starr(n)

Director: Steven Soderbergh (Conclusion of tonight's film)(n)

Written and directed by Paul Feig(n)

programme.title: Breach

programme.title: The Theory of Everything
programme.desc: This touching biopic of celebrated physicist Stephen Hawking explores his early years at Cambridge, where he fell in love with liberal-arts student and future wife Jane shortly before being diagnosed with ALS. As the years progress, Jane begins to feel more like a nurse than a spouse, and Hawking develops feelings for a woman who is hired to care for him(n)

programme.title: Hollywoodland

However, his enquiries lead him deep into Hollywood's seedy underbelly, uncovering a love triangle involving a former showgirl and a powerful studio executive(n)

programme.title: Lucy

programme.title: Trainwreck
programme.desc: A commitment-phobic binge drinker living in New York City must reevaluate her feelings about intimate relationships when a sports doctor pursues a romance with her(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: A university student enters into a sadomasochistic relationship with a businessman, whose desire for extreme intimacy stems from secrets from his past. Based on the best-selling novel by E L James

programme.title: Formula 51
programme.desc: Samuel L Jackson plays a pharmaceutical genius who has used his knowledge to make a fortune in illegal drugs, particularly with Formula 51, which is more potent than heroin, crack or anything else. But instead of selling it to his drug lord employer (Meatloaf), he jets to Liverpool where Robert Carlyle is acting as broker for Ricky Tomlinson, who's prepared to offer $20m for the formula - money Jackson would love to spend if he can stay alive long enough in Ronny Yu's fast-moving crime thriller

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair

programme.desc: This Little Light. In the Season 1 finale, Kyle and Anderson search Rome for a surprise perpetrator, while Sidney clarifies his intentions(n)

programme.title: Magnolia
programme.desc: P.T. Anderson's (Boogie Nights) wonderful ensemble drama with Tom Cruise (nominated for an Oscar), Philip Baker Hall, Philip Seymour Hoffman, William H. Macy, Julianne Moore, John C. Reilly all looking for meaning and happiness in the Valley(n)

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: Chaos reigns when a virus starts turning humans into blood-crazed predators. An alternate ending follows the film. Strong language/strong bloody violence/flashing images(n)

programme.title: Batman: Year One
programme.desc: In this thrilling origin story, Batman (voice of Ben McKenzie) begins his war on crime in Gotham City and decides to join forces with Lt. James Gordon (voice of Bryan Cranston), an honest cop dealing with a corrupt police force. Adapted from the comic-book series by Frank Miller and David Mazzucchelli(n)

programme.title: This Boy's Life
programme.desc: Some of the biggest stars in the world - Robert De Niro, Leonardo DiCaprio, Ellen Barkin and rising actress Eliza Dushku - provide some very fine acting in this gripping drama exploring the violent relationship between a boy and his stepfather. In 1950s Seattle, single mother Caroline meets the seemingly courteous Dwight. She agrees to marry him, thinking he will be able to curb her son Toby's bad behaviour. Based on a true story(n)

programme.title: A Little Chaos
programme.desc: In this ravishing romantic drama, gifted architect Sabine de Barra is hired to design a section of the elaborate landscaping at the Palace of Versailles for Louis XIV. The job brings with it gender and class barriers, and she also must contend with renowned landscaper André Le Notre, with whom she develops both a professional and romantic relationship(n)

programme.title: Evan Almighty
programme.desc: God contacts Congressman Evan Baxter and tells him to build an ark in preparation for a great flood(n)

programme.title: Tender Mercies
programme.desc: Tender Mercies is a compassionate love story tracing the relationship between a down and out singer and the young widow he meets in a small Texas town. Robert Duvall stars as MacSledge a man torn between the healing powers ofl ove and the conflicts of his past life as an alcoholic music star. Mac's love for his new wife Rosa Lee is tested by the temptations of renewed fame and the intervention of his bitter ex-wife, Dixie(n)

programme.title: The Judge
programme.desc: A lawyer discovers his estranged father is the prime suspect in his mother's death when he returns to his hometown for her funeral(n)

programme.title: Mulholland Dr.
programme.desc: David Lynch's Cannes-winning film stars Laura Elena Harring as the victim of a car crash who stumbles into Naomi Watts' apartment, her memory wiped. Watts, in Los Angeles to become an actress, befriends her but, as they try to discover Harring's true identity, neither of them are quite what they seem as Lynch subtly changes their lives and roles in this unique thriller(n)

programme.title: Outcast (?)
programme.desc: This Little Light(n)

programme.title: Outcast (?)
programme.desc: This Little Light(n)

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: From the Shadows It Watches. Rev. Anderson's powers are tested; Patricia reaches out to Kyle; and Sidney issues a warning

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: The Damage Done. Kyle and Allison reconnect to their past; and Rev. Anderson overdoes it during Remembrance Day

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: What Lurks Within. Rev. Anderson becomes increasingly alienated; Sidney's revelation stuns Kyle

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Close to Home. Kyle goes looking for Allison; Megan gets shocking news; and Anderson turns a bad situation into a worse one

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: A university student enters into a sadomasochistic relationship with a businessman, whose desire for extreme intimacy stems from secrets from his past. Based on the best-selling novel by E L James

programme.title: Formula 51
programme.desc: Samuel L Jackson plays a pharmaceutical genius who has used his knowledge to make a fortune in illegal drugs, particularly with Formula 51, which is more potent than heroin, crack or anything else. But instead of selling it to his drug lord employer (Meatloaf), he jets to Liverpool where Robert Carlyle is acting as broker for Ricky Tomlinson, who's prepared to offer $20m for the formula - money Jackson would love to spend if he can stay alive long enough in Ronny Yu's fast-moving crime thriller

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: Larceny mixes with romance in this caper film about a millionaire who masterminds a bank heist for fun and then enters into a game of cat and mouse with the insurance investigator assigned the case

programme.title: The Dancer Upstairs
programme.desc: Thriller following a detective's hunt for a South American guerilla who is stirring up the masses and bringing the country close to collapse under a highly organized terrorist movement. As the anarchist blows up buildings and kills indiscriminately, the detective finds hope and solace in his daughter's ballet teacher as he is forced to choose between love and the country he is trying to protect

programme.title: Brokeback Mountain
programme.desc: Over one summer herding sheep in 1963, cowboys Jake and Ennis fall in love. But 60s Wyoming isn't ready for gay cowboys and the two men face up to a lifetime of loneliness and lies

programme.title: The Water Diviner
programme.desc: An Australian farmer goes to Turkey in search of news about his sons, reported missing in action while fighting at Gallipoli

programme.title: Eagle Eye
programme.desc: Two strangers are ripped from their ordinary lives when they are coerced to become part of a high-tech assassination plot. Through blistering chases and shocking twists they try to escape, but where can they go when the enemy is everywhere?

programme.title: Get Hard
programme.desc: When a millionaire is convicted of fraud and sentenced to time in a maximum-security prison, he hires a man he assumes is an ex-con to coach him on surviving incarceration

programme.title: Scream 3
programme.desc: In Hollywood, Sidney Prescott must once again confront her demons when the stars of a horror movie sequel based on her life begin to die

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: Bike courier Jim wakes up in a London hospital to find the place deserted. Evading a crew of crazed killers, he learns that humanity has been virtually wiped out by a leaked virus. Zombie horror featuring an extra, post-credits downbeat ending

programme.title: Victor Frankenstein
programme.desc: This reimagining of the Frankenstein mythos focuses on Igor, the assistant of Victor Frankenstein. When the mad scientist builds an undead creature that soon becomes a grave danger, it's up to Igor to save Frankenstein from both the monster and himself

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Close to Home. Kyle goes looking for Allison; Megan gets shocking news; and Anderson turns a bad situation into a worse one

programme.title: Route 666
programme.desc: When Special Agents Jack and Stephanie cut through a condemned desert highway known as Route 666, they find that the road has a diabolical cloud hanging over it. It seems that years ago, a chain gang was killed in a brutal roadside massacre---and though they were killed, they never quite left the area!

programme.title: Joy
programme.desc: A Nigerian couple in the U.S. clash over a traditional circumcision for their 10-year-old daughter. A finalist in the Short Film Competition at the 2015 American Black Film Festival

programme.title: Evan Almighty
programme.desc: God appears before a sceptical congressman to tell him that his destiny is to be the modern-day Noah and build an ark capable of withstanding a mighty flood. While he initially struggles to come to terms with his task and begins to question his own sanity, the congressman soon finds himself gathering animals, chopping wood and trying to convince his disbelieving family

programme.title: A Knight's Tale
programme.desc: Rollicking medieval yarn about a young yeoman who dreams of competing as a knight

programme.title: Gone Girl
programme.desc: An adaptation of Gillian Flynn's bestseller about a husband who becomes the prime suspect in his wife's disappearance after she vanishes on their fifth wedding anniversary

programme.title: The Longest Ride
programme.desc: A star-crossed love affair begins between a retired bull rider who wants to get back in the saddle and an art student preparing to seek her fortune in New York City. As their relationship is put to the ultimate test, the wisdom of an ageing man who recalls his own lost love serves as a source of great inspiration

programme.title: Lady in the Water
programme.desc: An apartment block janitor discovers a magical woman in the swimming pool, who tells him that she has come from a children's fairytale and needs his help to return home. But something dangerous lurks in the woods as the story begins to take over the lives of the characters

programme.title: The Visit
programme.desc: Two siblings uncover a harrowing secret about their grandparents while spending a week at their remote Pennsylvania farm

programme.title: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)
programme.desc: A fading actor, best known for his portrayal of a superhero, plans a comeback by appearing in a Broadway play in this blisteringly funny showbiz satire. However, his attempts to become more altruistic, rebuild his career and reconnect with friends and family prove more difficult than expected

programme.title: The Pyramid
programme.desc: A group of archaeologists discover a lost pyramid in Egypt, and soon end up trapped inside it. Even worse, they realise that a horrific creature is hunting them through the labyrinth

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: Retired hit man John Wick returns to the fray to punish the gangsters who destroyed his life

programme.title: Eastern Promises
programme.desc: A London midwife stumbles into the city's seedy vice underbelly following the trail of a teenage mother

programme.title: Frank Miller's Sin City
programme.desc: Three flawed individuals search for a violent justice on the rain-soaked, crime-ridden streets of Basin City

programme.title: John Carpenter's Ghosts of Mars
programme.desc: John Carpenter's chilling sci-fi horror. On Mars in the near future, Melanie Ballard, a tough cop returns to base as the lone survivor of a mission to capture the planet's most notorious criminal, Desolation Williams. Her debrief leads the film into flashback, following her and her team entering a remote colony, only to discover that the ghosts of the long-ago indigenous inhabitants have been released, transforming the colonists into blood-crazed monsters(n)

programme.title: Ready to Rumble
programme.desc: Two enthusiastic young male wrestling fans watch their idol suffer what appears to be a humiliating defeat and decide to travel to Atlanta, the World Championship Wrestling headquarters, to cheer him up. They learn he is not at all the man they idolized; nonetheless, in a series of hilarious mishaps, they manage to revive his career(n)

programme.title: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns, Part 2
programme.desc: Frank Miller's seminal graphic novel The Dark Knight Returns is adapted for the small screen with a sprawling Warner Premiere animated film series that finds an old and weary Bruce Wayne (voiced by Robocop himself, Peter Weller) donning the cape and cowl once again after a long retirement. Covering the final two issues of the series, Part 2 pits the outlawed crusader against his nemesis, The Joker (voiced by LOST's Michael Emerson), as well as a militarized Superman, who carries out justice in the name of the United States of America. Ariel Winter (Modern Family) plays a female version of Robin, with Dark Shadows' David Selby rounding out the voice cast. Jay Oliva (Green Lantern: Emerald Knights directs from a script by Bob Goodman(n)

programme.title: Kill the Messenger
programme.desc: A reporter investigates a possible link between the CIA and the importing of cocaine into the U.S. in the 1980s(n)

programme.title: Eagle Eye
programme.desc: Shia LaBeouf and Michelle Monaghan star as two strangers who become pawns in a diabolical plot and must work together to prove that they are not terrorists(n)

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: A con artist takes on an inexperienced apprentice, but struggles to keep his eyes on the prize when he develops romantic feelings for her(n)

programme.title: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
programme.desc: The final chapter in the epic tale of Bilbo Baggins sees the hobbit and company caught up in a war that threatens to destroy all of Middle Earth(n)

programme.title: Batman Returns
programme.desc: When a corrupt businessman and the grotesque Penguin plot to take control of Gotham City, only Batman can stop them. Meanwhile, the mysterious Catwoman has her own agenda, which will give Batman something to think about(n)

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: In war-torn Sierra Leone, a white African diamond smuggler offers to help a fisherman find his family in return for a precious stone. They are joined in their search by an American journalist who is covering the diamond conflict(n)

programme.title: Run All Night
programme.desc: A former mob hit man is haunted by his life of crime. But when his estranged son is marked to be killed, he's forced to turn against his former employers in this white-knuckle thriller(n)

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: An international assassin known only as Agent 47 (Timothy Olyphant) carries out high-profile hits for a mysterious organization known only as "The Agency" in this adaptation of the popular Eidos Interactive video-game series. Agent 47 is an elite, genetically engineered assassin who takes great pride in his work. His lethal grace, steady shot, and unparalleled precision have all served to make him one of the most sought-after assassins in the world. But when the killer without a conscience is faced with an unanticipated series of developments, his entire perception of reality begins to shift. On assignment to take out Russian head of state Belicoff (Ulrich Thomsen), Agent 47 is caught off guard by the appearance of presidential look-alikes. When the high-profile hit captures the attention of such powerful intelligence organizations as the CIA and Interpol, agent Mike Whittier (Dougray Scott) is dispatched to rein Agent 47 in. Meanwhile, a mysterious Russian prostitute named Nika (Olga Kurylenko) has walked into Agent 47's life, causing the methodical killer to become overwhelmed by emotions that were previously foreign to him(n)

programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: Set in a dystopian future where infertility has led mankind to the brink of extinction, a sole pregnant woman holds the key to the survival of humanity. In 2027, the world's youngest person has died at the age of 18. Infertility has ravaged the world, leading it into anarchy. Eastern European and African societies have collapsed, causing their remaining populace to flee to England

programme.title: Trapped in Paradise
programme.desc: Three bumbling brothers pull a bank heist on Christmas Eve, but struggle to escape the small-town scene of the crime

programme.title: The Ladies' Man
programme.desc: Saturday Night Live cast member Tim Meadows gets his own movie as Leon Phelps, a radio host and sex therapy expert. (2000)

programme.title: Cop Car
programme.desc: In this exciting thriller, two rebellious boys steal a police cruiser and go for a joyride. But when they find a dead body in the trunk, they realize they must evade the car's owner, a corrupt small-town sheriff who's desperate to reclaim his property

programme.title: The Kingdom
programme.desc: When terrorists attack a US housing compound in Saudi Arabia, an FBI agent leads a team to investigate. However, when diplomacy prevents the team from taking any action, they team up with a rogue Saudi agent to find the extremists and deliver justice, regardless of protocol

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter
programme.desc: An immortal witch hunter faces off against the Witch Queen, who has returned from the dead, in a battle where the fate of humanity hangs in the balance

programme.title: Fracture
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins, Ryan Gosling and David Strathairn star in Gregory Hoblit's twist-filled legal drama. When top airplane engineer Ted Crawford discovers that his wife has been cheating on him he takes a devastatingly direct route to revenge: he drives home and shoots his errant spouse in the face. He then waits for the police to turn up and confesses to the crime. With his wife in a coma, Crawford is arrested and enters the justice system. It should, of course, be the simplest prosecution ever. And lawyer Willy Beachum can be forgiven for thinking that his last case as a criminal attorney (before he switches to company law) will be a doddle. However, once in court, Crawford, representing himself, proceeds to tear apart the ample evidence that's stacked against him. Can he possibly get away with his crime?

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
programme.desc: Sick of being bullied by her overpowering Greek family, dowdy Toula signs up for college. Despite every warning, Toula falls for a non-Greek guy, and it's not easy getting her clan to accept him

programme.title: El Cantante
programme.desc: A zesty soundtrack spices up this stirring but tragic profile of pioneering Latino salsa singer Hector Lavoe (Marc Anthony), who was popular in the 1960s, '70s and '80s. Jennifer Lopez, Anthony's real-life wife, costars as his spouse, and the cinematic sparks fly when the two are onscreen. Lopez also served as producer. Directed by Leon Ichaso, who co-wrote the script with David Darmstaedter and Todd Anthony Bello. John Ortiz, Manny Perez, Federico Castelluccio, Vincent Laresca, Romi Diaz

programme.title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
programme.desc: The Coen Brothers' deliriously weird, Oscar-nominated film, improbably (and very loosely) based on The Odyssey. George Clooney, John Turturro and Tim Blake Nelson are three chain-gang convicts who make a break for freedom when Clooney finds out his wife is going to re-marry

programme.title: The Specialist
programme.desc: Action thriller about an explosives expert and contract killer hired by a woman who wants revenge on the Cuban drug lord who murdered her father. Living in seclusion following an operation that went wrong and a confrontation with a crooked colleague, the hit man only reluctantly gives in to the wronged woman's persistent pleading. But when he finally agrees, he finds himself pitted against his old enemy, now in the drug lord's employ

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: In this action-packed thriller, a mysterious, superhuman assassin teams with a young woman to take down a major corporation plotting to use his genetic makeup to create a race of unstoppable killers

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: A con artist takes on an inexperienced apprentice, but struggles to keep his eyes on the prize when he develops romantic feelings for her

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: Michael Mann's stirring biopic about heavyweight champion Muhammad Ali which chronicles the boxer's life from 1964 to '74(n)

programme.title: Bulletproof
programme.desc: Action comedy about an undercover policeman who befriends a petty criminal so that he can get evidence against a drugs baron. But with the target in sight, things start to go disastrously wrong(n)

programme.title: An American Haunting
programme.desc: In 1818, the daughter of a Tennessee landowner is haunted by an evil spirit. Can it be stopped before the frights turn fatal?(n)

programme.title: Beneath the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: When Taylor (Charlton Heston) disappears, Zira (Kim Hunter) and Brent (James Fanciscus) set out to find the missing explorer. They battle a disfigured group of revolutionaries who worship a nuclear bomb. Led by the Fat Man (Victor Buono), the group battles the apes and the astronauts for control of the territory. The leader of the apes is Dr.Zaius (Maurice Evans), who listens to Nova (Linda Harrison), the female scientist who expresses concern and compassion for the humans. Ursus (James Gregory) is the agitated ape who campaigns for a holy war against the Fat Man and his cronies in this science fiction drama(n)

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: Perceptive comedy-drama following the ups and downs of the parent-child relationships within a large family. An over-protective dad - determined to do a better job than his own distant father - anxiously dotes on his troubled, eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his three-year-old daughter into an academic high-flyer but neglects his wife; and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers(n)

programme.title: Innerspace
programme.desc: A test pilot is miniaturized and accidentally injected into a neurotic supermarket clerk. They work together with the help of the pilot's girlfriend to get him out(n)

programme.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
programme.desc: Milos Forman's Oscar-winning adaptation of Ken Kesey's novel. Jack Nicholson plays McMurphy, a two-bit crook who, facing a jail sentence, feigns insanity to be sentenced to a cushy mental hospital. But his plan backfires when the hospital turns out to be anything but cushy, with its oppressive routines and a tyrannical head nurse who is out to quash any vestige of the patients' personal independence. Free-spirited McMurphy becomes a catalyst for the frustrations of his down-trodden fellow patients and a worthy adversary for the head nurse(n)

programme.title: Horrible Bosses 2
programme.desc: The follow-up to the employee-revenge comedy finds Dale, Kurt and Nick endeavour to become their own bosses with a new entrepreneurial venture. When a slick investor steals their idea, the boys turn back to crime to seek some justice(n)

programme.title: Burn After Reading
programme.desc: A disk containing the memoirs of a CIA agent ends up in the hands of two unscrupulous gym employees who attempt to sell it(n)

programme.title: Mystic Pizza
programme.desc: Three teenagers learn a lot about life and love one summer in this romantic comedy-drama. Kat (Annabeth Gish), Daisy (Julia Roberts), and Jojo (Lili Taylor) are three working-class women just out of high school who have jobs at the same pizza parlor in the resort community of Mystic, Connecticut. Kat wants to study astronomy at Yale; when she starts baby-sitting for Tim (William R. Moses), a wealthy Yale graduate summering in Mystic, she finds herself falling in love with him, even though he's married and nearly twice her age. Daisy, who isn't sure what she wants from life, starts going with Charlie (Adam Storke), a recent law school dropout, though she starts to think that it may be more to rebel against her family than out of genuine affection. And Jojo is attracted to Bill (Vincent D'Onofrio), but she doesn't want to get married (she's already left him at the altar once); when Bill announces that he's no longer willing to have sex without marriage, she has to decide if his affections are worth a lifetime commitment. Conchata Ferrell appears in a supporting role as Leona, the proprietor of the pizza parlor, who zealously guards the secret formula of her sauce(n)

programme.title: Music and Lyrics
programme.desc: Hugh Grant and Drew Barrymore make beautiful music together in this warm and winning romantic comedy. Grant is a 1980s rock star working the oldies circuit who teams with an unlikely collaborator (Barrymore) to write a tune for a reigning pop princess (Haley Bennett), who plans to perform the song with Grant at a mega-concert at Madison Square Garden. Written and directed by Marc Lawrence. Kristen Johnston, Brad Garrett, Campbell Scott(n)

programme.title: What Happens in Vegas
programme.desc: Two strangers (Cameron Diaz and Ashton Kutcher) find themselves hitched after a wild night of Las Vegas shenanigans in this 20th Century Fox comedy. Jack Fuller (Kutcher) is a single Manhattanite who can never quite commit to a permanent, long-term relationship and repeatedly hears from his lovers that he "isn't serious boyfriend material." Employed by his father (Treat Williams) at a local furniture business, Jack spends his workdays goofing off by watching sporting events behind dad's back. Joy McNally (Diaz) is faring slightly better; a young, polished urbanite, she juggles a demanding job as a trader on the NYSE with a marital engagement to the impressive Mason (Jason Sudeikis), but has modified her entire life and all of her interests to please her intended. Coincident with Mr. Fuller's decision to fire his son, Mason severs his engagement to Joy; as a result, both Jack and Joy hit the skids at around the same time and decide to cut their losses by heading out to Vegas. The two accidentally bump into one another when a computer mix-up at the hotel puts them in adjoining rooms; though they begin their acquaintanceship by bickering endlessly, they end up spending a long, drunken night on the town together, and when the sun rises and Joy comes to, she discovers that she unwittingly married Jack in the middle of the night. Alas, just when the two are about to call it quits by filing for divorce after the shortest marriage in history, Jack tosses a coin into a Vegas slot machine and hits a three-million-dollar jackpot -- which naturally pits the newlyweds against one another in an attempt to claim the full share of the money. A conservative local judge, R.D. Whopper (Dennis Miller), then adds the final twist by refusing to grant a divorce until Joy and Jack have given married life a fair shake. In time, the marrieds may just discover that this union isn't as far off the mark as they initially thought. Dennis Farina, Queen Latifah, and Zach Galifianakis round out the supporting cast(n)

programme.title: Just Married
programme.desc: A young newlywed couple honeymoon in Europe, where obstacles challenge their ability to sustain the marriage. Staring Ashton Kutcher and Brittany Murphy(n)

programme.title: The Old Man and the Sea
programme.desc: John Sturges' Oscar winning adaptation of Ernest Hemmingway's story about an old fisherman whose gigantic catch drags him out to sea

programme.title: Boys Town
programme.desc: This film focuses on Father Edward J. Flanagan, whose philosophy that no boy will grow up bad if given a chance in life culminates in his formation of Boys Town in Omaha, Nebraska. Unable to raise funds through "proper" channels, Flannagan finds that his staunchest supporters are the workaday folks

programme.title: Whipsaw
programme.desc: Vivian, Ed and Harry steal jewels in Paris. In New York government agent McBride accompanies Vivian riding across the country with the loot. She falls in love with him and gives up crime; he finds the stash and arrests her. Rival crooks Doc and Steve, who had already stolen the stolen jewels once, attempt to take them once again

programme.title: Small Town Girl
programme.desc: A drunken, rich playboy proposes to a young woman from a rural town, and she accepts. He has regrets the next day, but his parents insist they stay married for six months to avoid a scandal

programme.title: The Young in Heart
programme.desc: Tale of a sweet-natured, lonely old woman and the effect she has on a family of con artists

programme.title: The Farmer Takes a Wife
programme.desc: A farmer woos and marries an unlikely canal-boat cook, who thinks him yellow when he avoids sparring with her former ersatz beau

programme.title: Delicious
programme.desc: Delicious represents the first time that George and Ira Gershwin ever wrote a musical score exclusively for the screen. Unfortunately, the film fails to come up to the standards set by the music, though it's not from lack of trying. Janet Gaynor stars as Heather Gordon, a poor Scotch immigrant who dreams of relocating to the United States. Her aspirations are confounded by the intractability of the customs inspectors, who are bound and determined to send Heather back whence she came. In the meantime, she takes up residence in a rooming house catering to immigrants, where the other tenants -- especially comic-relief Swede Jansen (El Brendel) -- work overtime to cheer her up. All ends happily when American millionaire Jerry Beaumont (Charles Farrell) proposes marriage, despite his family's objections. The musical numbers include the overly coy title tune, a bizarre "Welcome to America" setpiece in which Heather dreams that she's being greeted by a singing Statue of Liberty, and a virtually complete performance of Gershwin's Second Rhapsody (aka The New York Rhapsody). The film's highlight, however, is El Brendel's rendition of the Blah Blah Blah song, in which he itemizes every love-song cliché known to man

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: A Star is Born came into being when producer David O. Selznick decided to tell a "true behind-the-scenes" story of Hollywood. The truth, of course, was filtered a bit for box-office purposes, although Selznick and an army of screenwriters based much of their script on actual people and events. Janet Gaynor stars as Esther Blodgett, the small-town girl who dreams of Hollywood stardom, a role later played by both Judy Garland and Barbra Streisand in the 1954 and 1976 remakes. Jeered at by most of her family, Esther finds an ally in her crusty old grandma (May Robson), who admires the girl's "pioneer spirit" and bankrolls Esther's trip to Tinseltown. On arrival, Esther heads straight to Central Casting, where a world-weary receptionist (Peggy Wood), trying to let the girl down gently, tells her that her chances for stardom are about one in a thousand. "Maybe I'll be that one!" replies Esther defiantly. Months pass: through the intervention of her best friend, assistant director Danny McGuire (Andy Devine), Esther gets a waitressing job at an upscale Hollywood party. Her efforts to "audition" for the guests are met with quizzical stares, but she manages to impress Norman Maine (Fredric March), the alcoholic matinee idol later played by James Mason and Kris Kristofferson. Esther gets her first big break in Norman's next picture and a marriage proposal from the smitten Mr. Maine. It's a hit, but as Esther (now named Vicki)'s star ascends, Norman's popularity plummets due to a string of lousy pictures and an ongoing alcohol problem. The film won Academy Awards for director William Wellman and Robert Carson in the "original story" category and for W. Howard Greene's glistening Technicolor cinematography

programme.title: State Fair
programme.desc: Slice of Americana about a rural family's annual trip to the Iowa State Fair, where pop enters his prize hog in a contest, mom shows off her pickles and jams, and both kids just want some fun. A Best Picture nominee. Musical remakes of the film were released in 1945 and 1962

programme.title: Change of Heart
programme.desc: Four courageous college graduates become heroes when they successfully complete a 15-hour coast-to-coast plane flight. Alas, things don't go so well for the foursome when they return to earth to seek out employment. Chris Thring (Charles Farrell) has a particularly rough time of it, but his sweetheart Catherine Furness (Janet Gaynor) remains faithful through thick and thin. Trouble brews in the form of Chris and Catherine's mutual friends Mack McGowan (James Dunn) and Madge Rountree (Ginger Rogers): Catherine thinks Chris is in love with Madge, while Mack falls in love with Chris? and on and on it goes. Shirley Temple shows up in the early scenes as a plane passenger, while that grand old trouper Gustav von Seyfertitz sheds his usual villainous image as the film's avuncular last-minute problem-solver. Change of Heart is based on a novel by Kathleen Norris

programme.title: Lucky Star
programme.desc: In this drama, a lonely woman leads an isolated life on a ramshackle with her widowed mother who firmly believes her daughter should marry a recently returned WW I veteran. Although the mother's intentions are good, the daughter already loves another veteran. Prior to the war, both men had been linesmen, but her true love was crippled in battle and cannot resume his trade. The mother therefore does not consider him to be a good match. She then betroths her daughter to the other. Just before they are to marry, her true love miraculously recovers, defeats his rival, and ends up marrying her

programme.title: Street Angel
programme.desc: The checkered past of a woman on the run comes back to haunt her just as she falls in love

programme.title: Ladies in Love
programme.desc: The lives and loves of three Budapest belles. Janet Gaynor. Susie: Loretta Young. Yoli: Constance Bennett. Marie: Simone Simon. Rudi: Don Ameche. John: Paul Lukas. Karl: Tyrone Power. Kentner: J. Edward Bromberg. Sandor: Alan Mowbray. Horvath: Wilfrid Lawson. Directed by Edward H. Griffith(n)

programme.title: Sunny Side Up
programme.desc: Poor girl makes sweet music with rich boy. Janet Gaynor, Charles Farrell. Eric: El Brendel. Bee: Marjorie White. Mrs. Cromwell: Mary Forbes. Eddie: Frank Richardson. Jane: Sharon Lynn. Joe: Joe E. Brown. Songs include the title tune and "If I Had a Talking Picture of You." David Butler directed(n)

programme.title: Three Loves Has Nancy
programme.desc: About a small-town girl (Janet Gaynor) and the uproar she causes between an author (Robert Montgomery) and his publisher (Franchot Tone). Guy Kibbee, Reginald Owen, Claire Dodd, Cora Witherspoon, Emma Dunn, Charley Grapewin. Richard Thorpe directed(n)

programme.title: The Citadel
programme.desc: Donat stars as the idealistic young doctor struggling to regain his true aims after being seduced by the bright lights and easy money of a lucrative Mayfair practice in this fine adaptation of A.J. Cronin's autobiographical novel(n)

programme.title: Things to Come
programme.desc: William Cameron Menzies' version of the H.G. Wells futuristic novel about a post-World War collapse of civilization and its rebuilding through the year 2036(n)

programme.title: Outcast of the Islands
programme.desc: Joseph Conrad's study of a derelict and his Far East encounters. Trevor Howard, Ralph Richardson, Robert Morley, Wendy Hiller. Babalatchi: George Coulouris. Carol Reed directed(n)

programme.title: The Sound Barrier
programme.desc: Magnificent air sequences highlight this film about jet aircraft pioneers. Ralph Richardson, Ann Todd, Nigel Patrick. Philip: John Justin. Chris: Denholm Elliott. Jess: Dinah Sheridan. Will: Joseph Tomelty. David Lean directed(n)

programme.title: The Four Feathers
programme.desc: Alexander Korda's spectacular production of AEW Mason's action-adventure novel was directed by his brother Zoltan. John Clements stars as Harry Faversham, who is unfairly accused of being a coward by three fellow-officers and his fiancée Ethne Burroughs, but proves himself a hero during the war in Sudan in the 1890s. With Ralph Richardson, C Aubrey Smith, Allan Jeayes, Donald Gray, Jack Allen and Henry Oscar(n)

programme.title: Time Bandits
programme.desc: Surrealistic comedy-fantasy by director Terry Gilliam, with Craig Warnock as a young boy snatched from his suffocating suburban existence for a series of bizarre adventures in time and space by the renegade dwarfs led by David Rappaport(n)

programme.title: The Wrong Box
programme.desc: In this film, the parents of several British boys place 1000 pounds in a pool, to be invested and expanded upon. The resultant fortune will go to the last surviving member of the tontine. Finally, only two of the tontine participants are left: aged brothers with murder on their minds(n)

programme.title: The Heiress
programme.desc: In 19th century New York, a plain young woman falls in love with a handsome pauper. Her wealthy father, however, is sceptical of his motives and tries to put an end to their romance. Drama(n)

programme.title: The Fallen Idol
programme.desc: Carol Reed directed Graham Greene's tale of a boy (Bobby Henrey) who lies to protect his idol, a butler (Ralph Richardson) whose shrewish wife has been killed. Michele Morgan, Sonia Dresdel. Crowe: Denis O'Dea. Fenton: Walter Fitzgerald. Voted England's Best Film of 1948 by the British Film Academy(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: Don't Worry, Baby. A club expansion spreads Ghost thin, between Angela, the children, the business and Tommy. Meanwhile, Tommy faces a tough decision; Kanan returns to the life; and Angela has some doubts

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: In this riveting docudrama, a neuropathologist discovers a degenerative brain disease now known as CTE in the autopsies of several deceased pro-football players. After presenting his research, the doctor finds himself under fire from the NFL

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: A sexy thriller about divers who find themselves battling sharks and ruthless criminals after discovering hidden treasure and a crashed plane loaded with cocaine

programme.title: Snow Dogs
programme.desc: Miami dentist Ted Brooks is delighted to hear that he has been named his mother's will, and travels to Alaska to claim his inheritance. But he discovers his new property is slightly unusual: he now owns a team of sled dogs. It turns out his mother was an Alaskan sled-racing champion! Another shock awaits Ted in the frozen wastes: his real dad is a grumpy old white man who's only interested in Ted's dogs.The fun comes as thick and fast as a blizzard when Ted decides to gain his dad's respect by defending his mother's title. The only trouble is, he's never raced sled dogs in his life... Two Oscar winners come together in this hilarious movie, as Cuba Gooding Jr plays the dentist who spends a lot of his time up to his waist in snow, while James Coburn is his father, who's out to get his son's inheritance. Laughter comes in flurries as Gooding proves how cool he is, in a very different way from his normal roles!

programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.desc: Prequel in which prehistoric everyman Fred Flintstone woos wealthy Wilma Slaghoople as the fledgling couple travel to glitzy Rock Vegas with friends Barney Rubble and Betty O'Shale

programme.title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind
programme.desc: While out on a call, Roy Neary, a power repairman, witnesses' unidentified flying objects in the skies near his Muncie, Indiana home. This encounter sets into action a startling chain of dramatic events. Neary tries desperately to understand what he has experienced. He is baffled by the governmental cover-up that blocks his efforts, however, and finds himself increasingly driven to the emotional edge

programme.title: Into the Blue
programme.desc: A sexy thriller about divers who find themselves battling sharks and ruthless criminals after discovering hidden treasure and a crashed plane loaded with cocaine

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Age of Umbrage. When Cam's words during an interview are taken out of context, the result is a scandal that envelops the whole family

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: Gerard Butler stars in Marc Forster's violent, fact-based drama about a substance-addicted criminal who finds God and relocates to Sudan to offer his own idiosyncratic brand of Christian charity. The film initially portrays Sam Childers as being a far from nice man: a misogynistic biker whose life is steeped in crime, narcotics and violence, and who quickly returns to armed robbery almost as soon as he's released from jail. But while he was inside, his wife Lynn found Jesus, and, after Sam gets stabbed, she urges him to join her at church. Sam subsequently has his own Damascene moment and starts life afresh, founding his own (legitimate) construction company. Before long he has also built his own church. But it's only after a trip to Sudan, where he witnesses the devastation wrought by the marauding Lord's Resistance Army, that he truly becomes driven. Relocating to the African country, he sets up a faith-based centre to care for victims of the LRA's violence and rape. And also takes up arms to literally fight the good fight... Also starring Michael Shannon

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Peter La Fleur owns Average Joe's Gym, a scruffy establishment with a loyal clientele, while across the street Globo Gym, owned by White Goodman, is all glass and chrome and full of toned muscle. When Peter learns that he must pay the bank $50,000 in 30 days, White is overjoyed: now he can have the parking lot his gym's always needed. But Peter decides to set up a money-earning dodgeball tournament (a sport that consists of not being hit by the opposing team's balls) to earn the dough and it is, of course, his team of misfits against White's tough pros in the final. Rawson Marshall Thurber's debut feature is a mix of verbal and physical humour and if the outcome is never in doubt, both Vaughn and particularly Stiller throw themselves into the film with enjoyable gusto

programme.desc: Mind-blowing sci-fi thriller about an ATF agent who tries to prevent a terrorist attack through the use of a secret government time-shifting experiment

programme.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story
programme.desc: Anarchic comedy that follows the efforts of a hapless gym proprietor and his misfit clients as they attempt to fend off the takeover bid of a rival bodybuilding empire. To generate much-needed cash for the virtually bankrupt facility, the motley crew enter themselves in a national dodgeball tournament and set themselves on course for a bruising showdown with a team made up of their foes. However, while the gym's unmotivated owner initially takes part only to appease his friends, he soon falls in love with the fast-paced sport - and the lawyer sent to oversee his finances!(n)

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: Based on the 1980s crime series of the same name, The Equalizer stars Denzel Washington as Robert McCall, a former Black Ops commando who faked his own death in hopes of living out a quiet life in Boston. However, when he comes out of his self-imposed retirement to save a young girl named Teri (Chloë Grace Moretz), he finds his thirst for justice reawakened after coming face-to-face with a syndicate of brutal Russian gangsters. Afterwards, McCall becomes the go-to man when the helpless require the kind of vengeance they would never find without his skills(n)

programme.desc: The spirit of a semi-dead boy makes good in this adaptation of the young-adult novel by Swedish author Mats Wahl. A privileged--and not very well-liked--senior in his Seattle high school, brooding poet Nick, is blamed for ratting out tough girl Annie to the cops for a jewellery heist. Soon his spirit is running loose trying to connect with the people around him

programme.desc: Joseph Donnelly (Cruise), a hot-headed young Irishman whose home was burned after his father's violent death, decides to take revenge on the "high-handed" Protestant landlord, Daniel Christie (Robert Prosky)

programme.title: Untraceable
programme.desc: Academy Award-nominee Diane Lane stars in this chilling thriller as an FBI agent trying to hunt down a serial killer who uses a website to document his murders. In a sadistic twist, his victims are killed at a faster rate when the site receives more hits, thus making everyone who views the site accomplices to the murder. As the phenomenon of the internet killings spirals out of control, the investigators' work on a timeline rushed by the dark nature of human curiosity and search for a killer who, having effectively covered his tracks, appears to be...untraceable!(n)

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars in the incredible true story of a rebel German army officer who led a plot to assassinate Adolf Hitler and overthrow his ruthless Nazi regime during World War II(n)

programme.title: Witness
programme.desc: Oscar-nominee Harrison Ford plays detective John Book, assigned to guarding Amish mother Rachel Lapp and her son Samuel, who witnessed a murder in Philadelphia station's restroom. But the killers are after them and the three must hide out in Lapp's community, where Book's aggressive, hard-bitten manner clashes with the gentler belief of the Amish in Peter Weir's tough, Oscar-winning romantic drama(n)

programme.title: Regarding Henry
programme.desc: Harrison Ford stars in this moving drama as a successful but self-centred lawyer who, having placed his profession above all else, has become estranged from his family and is loathed by his work colleagues. However, one night his life is irrevocably altered by a stray bullet, temporarily retarding him physically and mentally. The shocking accident forces him to start over again, rebuilding his world and reassessing his life with the help of wife Annette Bening(n)

programme.title: Predator
programme.desc: Hi-tech action fantasy about the unexpected enemy encountered by a unit of crack commandos on a rescue mission deep in the dense jungles of Central America. The routine operation becomes a desperate battle for survival against an alien predator that kills with a fury and efficiency unmatched by any creature on Earth(n)

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven
programme.desc: Ridley Scott directed this epic-scale historical drama inspired by the events of the Crusades of the 12th century. Balian (Orlando Bloom) is a humble French blacksmith who is searching for a reason to go on after the death of his wife and children. Balian is approached by Godfrey of Ibelin (Liam Neeson), a fabled knight who has briefly returned home after serving in the East. Godfrey informs Balian that he is his true father, and urges the blacksmith to join him as he and his forces journey to Jerusalem to help defend the holy city. Balian accepts, and he and Godfrey arrive during the lull between the Second and Third Crusades, in which the city is enjoying a fragile peace. Both Christian and Muslim forces are temporarily in retreat, thanks to the wisdom of the Christian monarch King Baldwin IV (Edward Norton), his second-in-command Tiberias (Jeremy Irons), and Muslim potentate Saladin (Ghassan Massoud). Violent agitators on both sides are foolishly eager to end the peace in a bid for greater power, and Saladin bows to pressures from Muslim factions; Godfrey is one of a handful of brave knights who has thrown his allegiance behind Baldwin IV and his community of diversity, and Balian joins him as they use their skills as warriors in a bid to build a lasting peace. Kingdom of Heaven also stars Eva Green as the princess Sibylla, David Thewlis as Hospitaler the priest, and Brendan Gleeson as Reynald(n)

programme.title: The Night Before
programme.desc: Three childhood friends who get together every Christmas Eve plan one last epic night out to celebrate the end of an era(n)

programme.title: Superbad
programme.desc: This raunchy teen comedy blockbuster from producer Judd Apatow ("Knocked Up") centers on a trio of nerdy high-school friends who have a wild night of misadventures while trying to buy booze for a big graduation party. Jonah Hill, Michael Cera and Christopher Mintz-Plasse star. Directed by Greg Mottola(n)

programme.title: Magic in the Moonlight
programme.desc: Man is out to expose fraudulent mediums, but finds his views tested when he meets seemingly genuine spiritualist

programme.title: The History Boys
programme.desc: A sharp and smart script by Alan Bennett, who adapted his Tony-winning play, propels this absorbing classroom drama. Set in 1980s England, it's a study of "clever but crass" teen students and a teacher (Richard Griffiths) prepping them for university acceptance at the likes of Oxford and Cambridge. Directed by Nicholas Hytner, who did the honors for the London stage presentation. Stephen Campbell Moore and Frances De La Tour costar as fellow teachers. Samuel Barnett, Dominic Cooper

programme.title: Young@Heart
programme.desc: The Young@Heart Chorus is a vocal group from Northampton, MA, who have earned an international reputation for their unique interpretations of songs by Sonic Youth, the Ramones, and the Clash. However, this isn't a teenage garage band attacking the classic punk rock songbook -- the Young@Heart Chorus is comprised of 22 senior citizens whose average age is 80, and under director Bob Cilman they've gained a degree of fame for their enthusiastic a cappella renditions of well-known rock & roll tunes. Filmmaker Stephen Walker spent several weeks with the members of the Young@Heart Chorus as they rehearsed for their annual concert in Northampton, and Young@Heart is a documentary which offers a look at their rigorous rehearsal process, the background of several members, and their efforts to stay active and think positive, even as their friends succumb to old age. Produced for British television, Young@Heart was screened in competition at the 2007 Los Angeles Film Festival

programme.title: Miss Meadows
programme.desc: A mannered schoolteacher turns into a ruthless vigilante on a mission to right the world's wrongs

programme.title: Birthday Girl
programme.desc: In Jez Butterworth's debut film, Ben Chaplin plays John Buckingham, a bank manager in the very English town of St Albans. Despairing at finding love, he orders mail-order Russian bride Nadia and is initially delighted with his 'purchase'. But things take a darker turn when her two large and menacing cousins arrive and move in to their tiny house and he realises that not everything bought over the internet comes with a guarantee…

programme.title: Goats
programme.desc: A pot-smoking teen raised by his New Age mother and a marijuana-growing goat herder enrolls in the same East Coast prep school his absentee father once attended, and has difficulty fitting in despite his high GPA and athletic prowess

programme.title: Magic in the Moonlight
programme.desc: Man is out to expose fraudulent mediums, but finds his views tested when he meets seemingly genuine spiritualist

programme.title: Friends With Money
programme.desc: LA thirtysomething Olivia watches all her friends getting married and building their careers. Meanwhile, she still works as a maid and doesn't have a boyfriend. Romantic comedy with a great female cast

programme.title: Miss Meadows
programme.desc: A mannered schoolteacher turns into a ruthless vigilante on a mission to right the world's wrongs

programme.title: Labyrinth of Lies
programme.desc: In this historical drama, idealistic German public prosecutor Johann Radmann (Alexander Fehling) becomes interested in the case of Charles Schulz, a former Nazi officer at Auschwitz who is now a schoolteacher. Radmann initially encounters resistance from the rest of his department when he begins his investigation, but senior prosecutor Walter Friedberg (Robert Hunger-Buhler) ultimately allows him to build as many cases as possible against the 8000 people who worked at the death camp. Helmed by first-time feature-film director Giulio Ricciarelli, Labyrinth of Lies is based on the Frankfurt Auschwitz trials, a previously lesser-known chapter of Germany's post-WWII history in which the country was forced to reckon with the Nazis who returned to everyday life following the end of the war. Germany's official Foreign Language submission for the 2016 Academy Awards. Friederike Becht, Andre Szymanski, and Hansi Jochmann co-star

programme.title: The Thin Red Line
programme.desc: Epic World War II drama about a group of soldiers searching for the inner strength to carry on fighting for the country and families they have left behind. The men of Charlie Company are sent to the beautiful Pacific island of Guadalcanal to retake the island from the Japanese. Director Terrence Malick's first film for 20 years boasts an all-star cast and bloody action

programme.title: Testament of Youth
programme.desc: An adventurous young British woman wins a scholarship to Oxford, where she falls in love with a fellow student. Later, their relationship is tested when he joins the military following the onset of World War I

programme.title: Drugstore Cowboy
programme.desc: The operative word in Drugstore Cowboy is "drug". Matt Dillon plays the leader of a group of dopeheads who wander around the country robbing pharmacies to feed their habits. Dillon's chums include doltish James Le Gros and teen-age junkie Heather Graham; also along for the ride is Dillon's wife Kelly Lynch. Their nemesis is cop James Remar, whom Dillon takes perverse delight in humiliating. When one of the young addicts dies of an overdose, it promps Dillon to try to go straight, a task complicated by wife Lynch's determination to stay high and by the corrupting presence of an ex-priest, played by Naked Lunch author William Burroughs. Drugstore Cowboy was director Gus Van Sant's breakthrough picture(n)

programme.title: 21 Grams
programme.desc: A tragic accident brings together the destinies of Paul, a gravely ill heart patient, Jack, an ex-con who has found God and Cristina, a loving wife and mother(n)

programme.title: Separate Lies
programme.desc: A damaged relationship is stretched to its desperate limits in this drama. Anne (Emily Watson) and James (Tom Wilkinson) are a seemingly happy and prosperous British couple who divide their time between a flat in London and a house in the country. However, their marriage is not as contented as one might imagine, and for years James has turned a blind eye to just how deeply unhappy Anne has become with him. Their lives together reach a crossroads when Anne meets the handsome and charming Bill Bule (Rupert Everett); Anne becomes deeply infatuated with him, which only reinforces her dissatisfaction with James, but when the two become involved in an accident that kills another man, Bill drops out of the picture and James decides he must step forward to protect the woman he wed. Separate Lies was the directorial debut from screenwriter Julian Fellowes(n)

programme.title: Monkey Kingdom
programme.desc: This nature documentary follows the struggles of a young monkey mother to care for and raise her new baby in the wilds of Southern Asia(n)

programme.title: Testament of Youth
programme.desc: In this gripping historical drama, an adventurous young British woman wins a scholarship to Oxford, where she falls in love with a fellow student. Later, their relationship is tested when he joins the military following the onset of World War I(n)

programme.title: Drugstore Cowboy
programme.desc: The operative word in Drugstore Cowboy is "drug". Matt Dillon plays the leader of a group of dopeheads who wander around the country robbing pharmacies to feed their habits. Dillon's chums include doltish James Le Gros and teen-age junkie Heather Graham; also along for the ride is Dillon's wife Kelly Lynch. Their nemesis is cop James Remar, whom Dillon takes perverse delight in humiliating. When one of the young addicts dies of an overdose, it promps Dillon to try to go straight, a task complicated by wife Lynch's determination to stay high and by the corrupting presence of an ex-priest, played by Naked Lunch author William Burroughs. Drugstore Cowboy was director Gus Van Sant's breakthrough picture(n)

programme.title: A Simple Plan
programme.desc: Based on Scott B. Smith's bone-chilling 1993 novel, A Simple Plan is a bit of a departure for horror film director Sam Raimi. Instead of flying eyeballs and dancing corpses, A Simple Plan is a taut crime thriller in the vein of Joel Coen's Academy Award-winning Fargo. Set during the white winters of Minnesota, this story tells the eerie tale of Hank and Jacob Mitchell (played by Bill Paxton and Billy Bob Thornton) who, along with a buddy, find a downed single-engine plane buried in the snowy woods. Inside it is a decaying pilot and a bag carrying four million dollars in one-hundred-dollar bills. The men decide to hide the money until spring when the snow is melted and the plane is found. If no one notices the missing money at that time, they will split it and live a wealthy new life. A simple plan, right? Wrong. Much like Humphrey Bogart's The Treasure of the Sierra Madre, things can only get worse, as distrust and greed creep into the minds of the principals. They find it difficult to decide which one gets to hold the money -- and even more impossible to keep from dipping into the stash until spring. And so on. It also becomes increasingly tough to keep a secret of this magnitude. And if all this doesn't get moviegoers' brains working, it seems there are suspicious characters in town who just may be able to link them to the plane, forcing the more dangerous and bloody question of what to do with those people and how to cover their tracks(n)

programme.title: The Thin Red Line
programme.desc: Terrence Malick's Oscar-nominated epic is set during the WWII American invasion of the island of Guadalcanal against fierce Japanese resistance. His first film after a 20-year hiatus, he uses a cast comprised of star names and then largely unknowns to evoke the reality of the carnage, aided by the cinematography of Oscar-winner John Toll. Following an army rifle company led by Lt Col Hall, the cast also includes Sean Penn, Adrien Brody, Jim Caviezel, John Cusack, George Clooney and Woody Harrelson(n)

programme.title: A River Runs Through It
programme.desc: An evocative story of two brothers growing up in the breathtakingly beautiful landscape of Montana near the Big Blackfoot River, where they are taught the art of fly-fishing by their stern but loving father, a Presbyterian minister. As the boys grow older, they also grow apart, and although their shared love of fishing draws them together again, the shadows of tragedy are gathering in the background(n)

programme.title: All the King's Men
programme.desc: Remake of the 1949 classic chronicling the rise and fall of ruthless Louisiana politician Willie Stark(n)

programme.title: Catch a Fire
programme.desc: An involving fact-based political thriller set in 1980s South Africa, where a black man, after being unjustly arrested, turns anti-apartheid revolutionary(n)

programme.title: 21 Grams
programme.desc: A tragic accident brings together the destinies of Paul, a gravely ill heart patient, Jack, an ex-con who has found God and Cristina, a loving wife and mother(n)

programme.title: Swimming With Sharks
programme.desc: Buddy Ackerman is a corporate cutthroat who reigns over an entry level job anyone would kill for. The catch is, Buddy is the Boss from Hell! Ask Buddy's personal assistant, Guy, who is eager to climb the corporate ladder. On his first day, Guy quickly learns that no opportunity this promising comes without a cost

programme.title: Office Space
programme.desc: An employee, bored with his daily routine at work, stops caring about his job and leads his soon-to-be fired friends in a plan to rip off the company

programme.title: Manhattan
programme.desc: Tremendous Woody Allen romcom. Mariel Hemingway is his teenage girlfriend, but Diane Keaton's the one he really wants. One of cinema's most famous odes to a city

programme.title: Up in Smoke
programme.desc: This film, while despised by critics and lovers of cinema, is cherished by fans of the comedy team, Cheech and Chong. In this wildly irreverent comedy, Man Stoner (Tommy Chong) is thrown out of his rich parent's Hollywood Hill's home and hooks up with Pedro De Pacas (Cheech Marin) the leader of a rock-and-roll band. In a van made entirely of pure marijuana, the two set out on a ride from Los Angeles to Mexico and back. Despite all of this, they still have time to enter and win a "battle-of-the-bands" contest. Up in Smoke, produced and directed by Lou Alder is Cheech and Chong's first and best film

programme.title: Fools Rush In
programme.desc: 1997. Hilarious romantic comedy with Friends star Matthew Perry and Oscar-nominated actress Salma Hayek. A New York builder and a Mexican photographer marry after a one-night stand. Dir: Andy Tennant

programme.title: Roger Dodger
programme.desc: Roger Swanson is a cynical advertising copywriter with a razor-sharp wit who believes he's the modern casanova. But Roger's seemingly foolproof world of smooth talk and casual sex begins to unravel when he is dumped by the beautiful and confident Joyce who also happens to be his boss. To complicate his life further his teenage nephew Nick suddenly appears. Determined to loose his virginity Nick wants Roger to teach him all about seducing women. Welcoming the challenge, Roger guides Nick through the city's wild nightlife for an all-night crash course, only to realize that he--the adult--still has something to learn about what women, and men, really want. Awarded at Venice Film Festival as well as Tribecca Film Festival

programme.title: Kiss Me Goodbye
programme.desc: The love life of a widow (Sally Field) is disrupted by her late husband's ghost (James Caan). A remake of "Dona Flor and Her Two Husbands." Rupert: Jeff Bridges. Kendall: Paul Dooley. Charlotte: Claire Trevor. Mrs. Reilly: Mildred Natwick. Directed by Robert Mulligan

programme.desc: The whodunit board game comes to life as guests are invited to a swanky mansion to learn who is blackmailing them

programme.desc: Sean is financially strapped and on the verge of losing his home and his car until his roommate Dee Loc suggests he joins him as an employee at the local car wash. Tension mounts between the pals when the establishment's eccentric owner Mr. Washington promotes the more mature and responsible Sean over Dee Loc. However, when their boss is kidnapped, Sean and Dee Loc must work together to save their employer, their jobs, and their friendship

programme.desc: A writer who doesn't believe in love is tasked to write a romantic comedy. But when he meets a beautiful woman at a wedding, he is forced to rethink his beliefs. The only problem, she's already engaged

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: When aliens mistake images of 1980s arcade games as a sign of aggression, they attack Earth with evil versions of Pac-Man, Donkey Kong and other video-game characters. In response, the US president asks his old gamer pals to battle the invaders(n)

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: A man hoping to make his way back to the big time starts by heading back to middle school in this comedy. Roy McCormick (Martin Lawrence) is one of the most successful coaches in college basketball, but he's just as famous for his hair-trigger temper as he is for molding winning teams. When an outburst of anger during a game escalates into an embarrassing public indecent, McCormick loses his job and is banned from college sports. Looking for a way to rehabilitate his image, McCormick takes a job coaching the basketball team at the middle school he used to attend, only to discover his players are a handful of misfits and losers with no skill on the court. Can McCormick mold the kids into a winning team -- and make himself into a better man along the way? Rebound also stars Wendy R. Robinson, Breckin Meyer, Horatio Sanz, Megan Mullally, and Patrick Warburton(n)

programme.title: I Heart Huckabees
programme.desc: Environmental activist Albert hires two 'existential detectives' to find out what's keeping him awake at night. They discover that Albert's mind is haunted by handsome rival, corporate PR exec Brad. But does Brad need more help than Albert?(n)

programme.title: Cookie's Fortune
programme.desc: An outstanding ensemble cast including Glenn Close, Julianne Moore, Liv Tyler, Ned Beatty and Charles S. Dutton highlight this hilarious comedy about the suicide of a wealthy dowager (Patricia Neal) and its impact on a small Southern burg. Close plays the deceased's pretentious niece, who tries to cover up the suicide. Chris O'Donnell, Lyle Lovett, Donald Moffat. Robert Altman directed(n)

programme.desc: A man's seemingly perfect life is turned upside down when his girlfriend announces that she is pregnant and pressures him into marriage. Cynda Williams, Mushond Lee, Wendy Raquel Robinson, Maia Campbell, Victor Williams. Directed by G. Stubbs

programme.title: Master Harold...and the Boys
programme.desc: Athol Fugard's award-winning play about institutionalized racism during the Apartheid-era comes to the big screen under the direction of Emmy Award-winner Lonnie Price, who previously played the lead role of Hally in the original Broadway production. Growing up, Hally (Freddie Highmore) forged a lifetime's worth of fond memories alongside Sam and Willie, his family's two black servants. But years later, as a teenager, Hally learns that his alcoholic, invalid father will soon be returning home from the hospital, and impulsively lashes out at Sam and Willie. Meanwhile, the repercussions of Hally's rage prove devastating for everyone involved

programme.desc: A suicidal teenager finds help and love in group-therapy sessions with other patients his own age(n)

programme.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
programme.desc: The fate of the universe falls into the hands of cocky adventurer Chris Pratt and his ragtag team of unlikely heroes in Marvel's smash-hit superhero adventure(n)

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: Based on the successful French film of the same name, Tim Story's all-action thriller stars Queen Latifah as Belle, who drives the fastest taxi in New York, thanks to a little tinkering with the engine. She teams up with inept cop Andy Washburn to catch a team of bank-robbing babes, led by Vanessa, whose wheels are just as hot. The plot is straightforward but the film scores with its high-octane energy and stunning stunts. Edited for language and violence(n)

programme.title: American Violet
programme.desc: Nicole Beharie, Tim Blake Nelson, Will Patton, and Xzibit headline this fact-based drama about an innocent Texas mother caught up in a high-profile drug raid, and unjustly accused due to the uncorroborated testimony of a single informant. Dee Roberts (Beharie) is a young single mother of four living in a small Texas town. Arrested during a drug raid and accused of a crime she didn't commit, Dee goes against the wishes of her mother, Alma (Alfre Woodard), and rejects the plea-bargain that would free her from jail, but brand her as a felon for life. As word begins to spread that similar incidents are occurring in poor communities all across the country, Dee realizes that there are more mothers out there like her, and decides to take a stand against powerful district attorney Calvin Beckett (Michael O'Keefe). Now, despite being well aware of District Attorney Beckett's fierce reputation, Dee enlists the aid of ACLU attorney David Cohen (Nelson) and former narcotics officer Sam Conroy (Patton) in overcoming the seemingly insurmountable obstacles that, if not navigated with the greatest of caution, now threaten to destroy her life. With the custody of her children on the line, one brave mother wages a valiant battle to strike at the very heart of the corrupt Texas justice system(n)

programme.title: What's the Worst That Could Happen?
programme.desc: A professional thief tries to recover a prized ring taken from him by a ruthless millionaire(n)

programme.title: 30 for 30
programme.desc: Four Falls of Buffalo. The Buffalo Bills incredible four year run of AFC titles and four consecutive Super Bowl losses in the early 1990s are recounted in this sports documentary directed by Ken Rodgers. From plucky underdogs to perennial losers, the Bills' unprecedented run of futility is analyzed by the players, coaches, and media members who were involved. Four Falls of Buffalo is a part of ESPN's critically acclaimed 30 For 30 documentary series(n)

programme.title: E:60
programme.desc: Originally titled ESPN Reports, this was the cable service's effort to create a 60 Minutes-style weekly newsmagazine focusing on sports. The first episode set the tone with a piece on the "football fever" at Miami Northwestern High School, an interview with former major leaguer Cecil Fielder, a human-interest story concerning the tragically premature death of UNC Tar Heels "mascot" Jason Ray, and some musings from self-proclaimed sports psychic Dr. Bob. The individual segments were handled by such correspondents as Jeremy Schaap, Michael Smith, Rachel Nichols, Lisa Salters and Tom Ferry, while Bill Simmons, aka "The Sports Guy", appeared at the end of each episode with a few Andy Rooney-like random comments. Almost universally derided by the "legitimate" cable-news establishment, the series was generally praised by viewers as a noble effort to bring a straight-news slant to ESPN's familiar sports reportage. E:60 first aired on October 16, 2007(n)

programme.desc: I Hate Christian Laettner. A profile of former Duke University basketball stand-out Christian Laettner. Laettner's career at Duke was a lightning rod of attention - along with Coach Mike Krzyzewski, Laettner led the Blue Devils to back-to-back National Championship, while drawing the collective ire of the nation for his cocky and privileged appearance. programme.title: College Football Playoff National Championship
programme.desc: The offensive firepower, excitement and surprises of the 2016 College Football Playoff National Championship at University of Phoenix Stadium in Glendale, Arizona. All of the thrilling plays from Alabama's 45-40 victory over the ACC Conference champion Clemson Tigers are included, as well as analysis from the big game and the postgame trophy presentations. Key moments include Adam Griffith's momentum-shifting second-half onside kick with the score tied at 24 apiece, and two lengthy touchdowns catches from Crimson Tide tight end (and the game's Offensive MVP) O.J. Howard

programme.desc: Rand University. Marquis Daisy's documentary Rand University details the difficult upbringing faced by Randy Moss, who would grow up there and one day become one of the most talented wide receivers of his era.
